content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter group at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of three burner inserters:
- Inserter 1 at position (x=60.5, y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.
- Inserter 2 at position (x=61.5, y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.
- Inserter 3 at position (x=62.5, y=-60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position(x=62.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (x=62.5, y=-61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (x=107.5, y=-33.5) with a fluid box containing water.

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (x=117.5, y=-30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe Group 1 at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of a pipe group with fluid system 142794, containing water, and status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT.

### Pipe Group 2 at position(x=111.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of a pipe group with fluid system 142796 and status EntityStatus.EMPTY.

### Electricity Group at position(x=119.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of an electricity group with id 576328 and a small electric pole at position (x=119.5, y=-30.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect pipes.
- Make sure that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure that the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Make sure that the inserter has a valid source and destination.

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Make sure that the steam engine is connected to a valid fluid source.

### NAMESPACE
- connect_entities function: invoked multiple times, failed due to invalid pipe connections.
- Important variables:
  - boiler: Boiler entity at position (x=111.5, y=-32.0)
  - offshore_pump: OffshorePump entity at position (x=107.5, y=-33.5)
  - steam_engine: Generator entity at position (x=117.5, y=-30.5)
  - pipe: Pipe entity
  - Prototype.Pipe: Pipe prototype
  - Inventory: dictionary of items and their quantities
  - EntityStatus: enumeration of entity statuses
  - Position: class representing a position in the game world
  - Direction: enumeration of directions
  - fluid_system: integer representing a fluid system
  - fluid_box: list of fluids and their properties
